verses.name: Psalms 17:6
verses.text: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.

verses.name: Psalms 17:7
verses.text: Shew thy marvellous lovingkindness, O thou that savest by thy right hand them which put their trust in thee from those that rise up against them.

verses.name: Psalms 17:8
verses.text: Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,

verses.name: Psalms 17:9
verses.text: From the wicked that oppress me, from my deadly enemies, who compass me about.

verses.name: Psalms 17:10
verses.text: They are inclosed in their own fat: with their mouth they speak proudly.
